plays.text: Penalty to Brad Ference 2 minutes for Interference Sean Avery
Goal scored by Pavel Datsyuk assisted by Sergei Fedorov and Brendan Shanahan
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Peter Worrell
Goal scored by Andreas Lilja assisted by Niklas Hagman and Olli Jokinen
Penalty to Niklas Hagman 2 minutes for Interference Darren McCarty
Penalty to Mathieu Dandenault 2 minutes for Hooking Marcus Nilson
Goal scored by Darren McCarty assisted by Kirk Maltby and Kris Draper
Penalty to Jason Woolley 2 minutes for High Sticking Kristian Huselius served by Martin Gelinas
Penalty to Maxim Kuznetsov 2 minutes for Interference Ryan Johnson
Penalty to Kirk Maltby 2 minutes for Roughing Mathieu Biron
Goal scored by Viktor Kozlov assisted by Niklas Hagman and Mathieu Biron
Penalty to Andreas Lilja 2 minutes for Holding Henrik Zetterberg
